original: Bursell, Nils Sigurd Gustaf, kapten, assuransdirektör, Göteborg, f. 9/3/87 i Gbg av köpm. Klas A. V. B. o. Hildegard Lundberg. G. 11 m. Helena Ahlberg. B’arn: Arne Sigges’s0n f. 12, med. lic., StMm, Lajla Siggesson 18. — Realex., Gbgs handiinist., gymn:-kurs. Und :löjtn. v. Boh. reg. 10, löjtn. 15, kapt. 27, kapt. i res. Anst. v. Gbgs Kexfabr. 04, tj :man i Gbgs Sparbank OS-15, i Försäkr. A-B Ocean sed. 15, bitr. dir. där sed. 26, dir. o. chef f. dess sjöförsäkr :avd. sed. 33. Tf. sakk. i statens krigsförsäkr :nd 39, styr:-suppl. i Försäkr. A-B Ocean o. Ater-försäkr. A-B Union, ordf. i styr. f. A-B Sveavägen 123 o. 125 i Gbg.
translated: Bursell, Nils Sigurd Gustaf, captain, insurance director, Gothenburg, born on March 9, 1887, in Gothenburg to merchant Klas A. V. B. and Hildegard Lundberg. Married in 1911 to Helena Ahlberg. Children: Arne Siggeson, born in 1912, medical licentiate, StMm, Lajla Siggeson born in 1918. He attended a real school, Gothenburg's trade school, and a gymnasium course. He was a second lieutenant in Bohuslän Regiment 10, promoted to lieutenant in 1915, and to captain in 1927. He became a captain in reserve. He worked for Gothenburg's biscuit factory in 1904, Gothenburg's savings bank from 1915-1926, Ocean Insurance Company from 1915, as assistant director from 1926, and director and head of its marine insurance department from 1933. He served as acting expert in the state's war insurance board in 1939, as a board member of Ocean Insurance Company and Ater Insurance Company Union, and as chairman of the board for AB Sveavägen 123 and 125 in Gothenburg.

occupation.title: Director and Head of Marine Insurance Department
